snippet: Hassan Whiteside scored half his 20 points during a dominant stretch spanning the third and fourth quarters to help the visiting Miami Heat survive a Boston Celtics rally and end a two-game skid with an 83-75 victory.
abstract: Miami Heat beat Boston Celtics, 83-75, in NBA action.
lead_paragraph: Hassan Whiteside scored half his 20 points during a dominant stretch spanning the third and fourth quarters to help the visiting Miami Heat survive a Boston Celtics rally and end a two-game skid with an 83-75 victory.

headline.main: Heat Top Celtics to End Skid
headline.print_headline: Heat Top Celtics to End Skid
